description: See the Fields for the full story
full_summary:
-----------------------------------------

**Collection and Estimation of Underwater Biofouling of Commercial Vessels**
================================================================================

**Overview**
---------------

This request for proposal (RFP) seeks a contractor to collect and estimate underwater biofouling of commercial vessels in major Canadian ports. Biofouling is the process by which organisms accumulate on surfaces submerged in water, such as ship hulls, and can have significant ecological and economic impacts.

**Objectives**
----------------

The objectives of this project are to:

* Collect biological samples and estimate the percent coverage of fouling organisms on the vessel hull and niche areas of commercial ships in high traffic Canadian ports on the East (Halifax, NS) and West coast (Vancouver, BC) and Great Lakes (Hamilton, ON)
* Provide technical diving services to collect underwater video, photos, and physical scrapings of biofouling organisms on commercial ships
* Develop representative biofouling measurements for each ship sampled

**Scope of Work**
------------------

The contractor will provide a surface-supplied dive team, capable of completing the dive set-up, ship lock out, survey, and sample collection within approximately 8 hours. The scope of work includes:

* Collecting biological samples from the hull and niche areas of commercial ships
* Taking underwater video and photos of biofouling organisms
* Developing an estimate of percent coverage of fouling organisms on the vessel hull and niche areas

**Requirements**
------------------

* The contractor must have experience in commercial ship surveys and sampling
* The contractor must provide all necessary diving and safety equipment
* The contractor must arrange for use of a dive boat, as required

**Trade Agreements**
----------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada–Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement
* World Trade Organization–Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Note**
----------

Please refer to the attached tender notice and documents for more information.
